Title: Suspends the savings plan demonstration project in the city of New York; extends the effectiveness of the savings plan demonstration project in the city of New York
Summary: Suspends the savings plan demonstration project in the city of New York; extends the effectiveness of the savings plan demonstration project in the city of New York.
LawCode: Amd ยง36-c, Soc Serv L; amd Part K ยง2, Chap 58 of 2010
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to suspending the savings plan demonstration project in the city of New York; and to amend part K of chapter 58 of the laws of 2010, amending the social services law, relating to establishing the savings plan demonstration project, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
